item.title: Aleksandar Atlagić : Portfolio
item.description: I'm Aleksandar Atlagić, web developer who can be your ace in the sleeve.

item.title: About Aleksandar Atlagić
item.description: I am a student currently living in Belgrade, Serbia. My interests range from technology to programming. I am also interested in web development, design, and volunteering. I am on the final year of ICT collage and my future plan is to continue education while working/practise full or part time.

item.title: Aleksandar Atlagić projects
item.description: This is my projects so far: Tattoo studio - Galaxy ink., Barber shop - Fellas, The pub - FOOD & DRINK, Fitness center - FULL BLOWN

item.title: Contact Aleksandar Atlagić
item.description: If you want to get connected with me feel free, atlagic.aleksandar@gmail.com
